alert.note: Alert for Huron; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:01PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Richland, southern Huron, western Medina, northern Ashland and southern Lorain Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 801 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wakeman to near Plymouth. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Willard, Wellington, New London, Plymouth, Savannah, Polk, Oberlin, Sullivan, Lagrange, Penfield, Pittsfield, Greenwich, Spencer, North Fairfield, Bailey Lakes, Kipton, Rochester, Nova and Nankin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
